comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Pubs of Australia, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 36196524@N08
comment._content: This is presumably looking east, with Shelley St running off to the right, but I'm surprised the Erskine St tramway is double track, as it went "around the block" in a loop here.
